description: Users may experience difficulties installing specific drivers for Surface devices when attempting updates via the Windows 10 download page. The issue seems to center around users not successfully accessing the necessary drivers, which can impede device functionality and performance. The instructions in the post indicate that the driver installation might not be straightforward, leading to potential confusion. This symptom primarily affects users of Microsoft’s Surface line of devices running Windows 10. Problems can arise especially after reinstallation of the operating system or following major updates that alter driver availability.
